# ino-checkbox
A checkbox componing with label.

### Usage
The component can be used as follows:

```html
<ino-checkbox 
  checked="<boolean>"
  disabled="<boolean>"
  id="<string>" 
  name="<string>" 
  tabIndex="<number>"
  value="<string>">
    Label
</ino-checkbox>
```


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

#### checked

boolean

Marks this element as checked.


#### disabled

boolean

Disables this element.


#### id

string

The id of this element.


#### name

string

The name of this element.


#### tabIndex

number

Sets the tabIndex of this element.


#### value

string

The value of this element.
